sys_variable_value.value: Add approved user to family group

sys_element_mapping.value:
Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛First name,

Your  LegacyLink admin request was rejected. Please review the additional comments and submit a new request. 

Trigger➛...➛Additional comments

LegacyLink Support Team

Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Name

Your LegacyLink admin request Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Number for   Trigger➛...➛Itemhas been approved! As an admin, you will now be able to create and approve family records. Please look for an email confirmation for your access. Once received, you will be able to login. 

Welcome to LegacyLink!

LegacyLink Support Tram

sys_variable_value.value:
Name,

Your LegacyLink account is now set up! You can now create and approve family records request for your family group.

We are excited to assist with you with your family records management process. 

LegacyLink

{{Service Catalog_1.request_item.requested_for.name}}
Your requested access for {{Service Catalog_1.request_item.number}} is complete. You have been added to the LegacyLink admin assignment group. You can now create and approve family record requests. Welcome to LegacyLink!
